Discussions.Discussion_Name: Evaluation of the lecture and the exercise

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Dear all, the evaluation of the lecture and the exercise class are now available until the 29th of June. Please take the time to fill out the questionnaire, since we are depending on your feedback to make improvements to the course.

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Unfortunetly I wont bei able to hold my office hours today. If you have pressing questions let me know via e-mail. Otherwise we can also arrange Something via zoom or next week.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Office hours on Tuesday, June 4th moved

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Dear all, my office hours tomorrow, Tuesday, June 4th, will be moved by one day to Wednesday, June 5th, 2-4pm. Feel free to contact you me if you have questions and are not able to come at this time and we can schedule a seperate time, either in person or via Zoom.

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Today my office hours will take place 1-2pm instead of 2-4pm. If you have questions and are otherwise occupied during this time feel free to write me an email and we can also find another time.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Lecture on May 10th and other dates

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Dear all, according to the poll from last week, the majority of you prefers to move the lecture from Friday, May 10th to tomorrow, Tuesday, May 7th, 10-12am at MA 750. The exercise will in turn be postponed one week so that the next exercise will take place on Tuesday, May 14th. The lecture will then proceed to take place bi-weekly, i.e. the exercise after that is on May 28th. Additionally, the lecture on May 17th will be moved to May 21st, 10-12am at MA 750. Altogether we have the following schedule in the coming weeks: Tue, May 7th, 10-12am at MA 750 : Lecture Fr, May 10th : No Lecture/Exercise Tue, May 14th, 10-12am at MA 750 : Exercise Fr, May 17th : No Lecture/Exercise Tue, May 21st, 10-12am at MA 750 : Lecture Fr, May 24th, 8.30-10am at BH-N 333: Lecture Tue, May 28th, 10-12am at MA 750 : Exercise Afterwards: Lecture every Friday, Exercise every second Tuesday.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Poll regarding the lecture on May 10th

Messages.Author: Lukas Geuter
Messages.Content: Dear all, since the 9th of May is a public holiday and we know from experience that the attendence on a so called "Brückentag" is usually low, we consider moving the lecture on the 10th of May to the date of the exercise (7th of May, 10-12 am). Please fill out this poll until Friday, 3rd of May, to give us an idea of your preferences.
